price: Wọ́n so ọ̀rọ̀ àwọn yòókù rọ̀ ná títí àṣẹ Allāhu máa fi dé; yálà kí Ó jẹ wọ́n níyà tàbí kí Ó gba ìronúpìwàdà wọn.¹ Allāhu sì ni Onímọ̀, Ọlọ́gbọ́n. ²
arabic: وَءَاخَرُونَ مُرۡجَوۡنَ لِأَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِ إِمَّا يُعَذِّبُهُمۡ وَإِمَّا يَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ
footnotes:
1. Ìyẹn, àwọn tó ṣàì lọ sógun, àmọ́ tí wọn kò mú àwáwí irọ́ wá.
 2. Àṣẹ náà dé nínú āyah 118 níwájú.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waākharūna mur'jawna li-amri al-lahi immā yuʿadhibuhum wa-immā yatūbu ʿalayhim wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
